title: Gakuen Heaven: Endou-hen - Calling You
original_name: 学園ヘヴン 遠藤編〜Calling You〜
sinopse: Keita Itou receives a letter asking him to attend BL Academy for the gifted, but feels he has no talent what so ever other then his luck. This is the third version to be released based of the PS2 game Gakuen Heaven, which is Endou's version.
